comments.body:
Use `unknown` instead? 🤔

```suggestion
    propTables?: Array<ComponentType<unknown>> | false;
```

Or just delete the `any`? 🤔
```suggestion
    propTables?: ComponentType[] | false;
```

Use `unknown` instead? 🤔

```suggestion
    propTablesExclude?: Array<ComponentType<unknown>>;
```

Or just delete the `any`? 🤔
```suggestion
    propTablesExclude?: ComponentType[];
```

Use `unknown` instead? 🤔

```suggestion
    components?: { [key: string]: ComponentType<unknown> };
```

Or just delete the `any`? 🤔
```suggestion
    components?: { [key: string]: ComponentType };
```
